title: Motivational Management and Learning Strategy Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating secondary education curricula and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: In-service secondary teachers require enhanced competencies to motivate students and establish self-directed learning strategies in blended learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze motivation change patterns in blended learning and design phased intervention strategies.
Learners can design lessons utilizing motivational elements (e.g., goal visualization, feedback systems) in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can apply differentiated learning strategies (metacognition, resource management, etc.) based on learner type (novice/experienced).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
